changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: 第三方系统-会员信息表索引名称更正

changeSet.author: Shawn
changeSet.comment: 飞书事件记录增加租户索引-
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}social_feishu_event_log` ADD INDEX `idx_tenant_key`(`tenant_key`) USING BTREE COMMENT '租户索引';

changeSet.author: Shawn
changeSet.comment: 飞书事件记录增加应用索引-
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}social_feishu_event_log` ADD INDEX `idx_app_id`(`app_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT '应用索引';
